segments.text: Hello Mei , How about going for a meal this evening ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good idea ! I finish work at five . Why don ’ t we meet at six ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok that sounds good . Where shall I meet you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let ’ s meet in front of the train station .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok great , I ’ ll see you at six .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , see you tonight ! Don ’ t be late !
segments.speaker: S2
